open house.translation[0].definitions[0]: a day when a school or organization invites the public to come in and see the work that is done there
Parents are invited to attend the open house next Thursday.
open house.translation[0].definitions[1]: if it is open house at someone’s home, people are always welcome to visit at any time
He kept open house for a wide range of artists and writers.
open house.translation[0].definitions[2]: a party at someone’s house that you can come to at any time during a particular period
We’re having an open house Sunday, noon to 5 pm.
open house.translation[0].definitions[3]: an occasion when someone who is selling their house lets everyone who is interested in buying it come to see it
